attributes.action: Investigation of former British Nationals who have since 2008 changed their domicile nationality to an offshore tax haven to avoid UK tax
attributes.additional_details: I am requesting that HMRC investigate former British Nationals who have since 2008 changed their domiciled nationality to an offshore tax haven such as the Bahamas, Grand Cayman Islands or Barbados etc as a tax avoidance measure to avoid paying UK tax due on monies and assets held at such a tax haven prior to  their change of nationality.
